Double Punch/Injector/Counter Punch:



Double Punch smiled.  Raising both of his pinches, he fired a missile at 
Ultracon's back, and a missile Stegotron's back.

---

Beeline, the cyber-bee, dived, firing an optic blast at a downed Triceradon.

---

Counter Punch stumbled back from Ultracon's blasts, firing three shots from 
his photon rifle at the Maximal.

---

Injector twirled to the left, avoiding all the shots but one, sending him 
slamming into a tree.  Raising his launcher, he fired off three stinger 
missiles at Stegotron, an optic blast heading for Ultracon.
